title: William and Kate tour LIVE: Royal couple to follow in Diana's footsteps in Lahore
text:
Prince William and Kate Middleton are visiting Lahore today on the fourth day of their Pakistan tour.

William will follow in his mother's footsteps today by visiting Badshahi Mosque in the city, evoking memories of Princess Diana's trip to the place of worship in 1991.

Their itinerary today begins with a birthday party at SOS Children's Village, a charitable organisation in the heart of the city established in 1977.

Next up is a visit to the National Cricket Academy, where the couple will join youngsters for a match of Pakistan's national game.

The couple will meet Pakistan's cricketing legends, having already dined with Prime Minister Imran Khan on Tuesday.

William and Kate will then be taken on a tour of the Badshahi Mosque, the most historic Islamic site in Lahore, set in the heart of the Walled City.

Wrapping up the fourth and penultimate day of the 'most complex royal tour ever', the couple will then travel to the Shaukat Khanum Memorial Cancer Hospital and Research Centre.
description: Prince William and Kate Middleton will retrace the steps of Princess Diana by going to the same mosque and cancer hospital that she visited in Lahore
